'''"The Embers of Cinder City"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "The Embers of Cinder City" is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Battle Pass/Spiritweaver|Spiritweaver Battle Pass]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Iron Chunk = 6
|White Iron Chunk = 10
|sort = Iron Chunk;White Iron Chunk
}}
